channel.description: Recent content in üè¢ NVIDIA on HF Daily Paper Reviews by AI

item.title: FFN Fusion: Rethinking Sequential Computation in Large Language Models
item.description: FFN Fusion: Parallelizing sequential computation in large language models for significant speedups!

item.title: Cosmos-Reason1: From Physical Common Sense To Embodied Reasoning
item.description: Cosmos-Reason1: Physical AI models that reason and act in the real world, bridging the gap between perception and embodied decision-making.

item.title: Cosmos-Transfer1: Conditional World Generation with Adaptive Multimodal Control
item.description: Cosmos-Transfer1: An adaptable conditional world generation model using multimodal control.

item.title: SANA-Sprint: One-Step Diffusion with Continuous-Time Consistency Distillation
item.description: SANA-Sprint: An efficient diffusion model for ultra-fast text-to-image generation with continuous-time consistency distillation, achieving state-of-the-art performance in speed and quality.

item.title: Difix3D+: Improving 3D Reconstructions with Single-Step Diffusion Models
item.description: DIFIX3D+ improves 3D reconstructions by reducing artifacts via single-step diffusion models, enhancing novel-view synthesis quality and consistency.

item.title: One-step Diffusion Models with $f$-Divergence Distribution Matching
item.description: f-distill: One-step diffusion models through f-divergence minimization, outperforming reverse-KL with better mode coverage and lower variance.

item.title: V2V-LLM: Vehicle-to-Vehicle Cooperative Autonomous Driving with Multi-Modal Large Language Models
item.description: V2V-LLM leverages multi-modal LLMs for safer cooperative autonomous driving by fusing perception data from multiple vehicles, answering driving-related questions, and improving trajectory planning.

item.title: VLsI: Verbalized Layers-to-Interactions from Large to Small Vision Language Models
item.description: VLSI: Verbalized Layers-to-Interactions efficiently transfers knowledge from large to small VLMs using layer-wise natural language distillation, achieving significant performance gains without scaling…

item.title: Puzzle: Distillation-Based NAS for Inference-Optimized LLMs
item.description: Puzzle: a novel framework accelerates large language model inference by using neural architecture search and knowledge distillation, achieving a 2.17x speedup on a single GPU while preserving 98.4% ac…

item.title: Star Attention: Efficient LLM Inference over Long Sequences
item.description: Star Attention: 11x faster LLM inference on long sequences with 95-100% accuracy!

item.title: Hymba: A Hybrid-head Architecture for Small Language Models
item.description: Hymba: Hybrid-head architecture boosts small language model performance by 11.67x cache size reduction and 3.49x throughput, surpassing existing models.
